name: launch-with-mouse
objective: launch an application with the mouse pointer
description: Launch an application using the mouse pointer. gnome-terminal will be used to test whether launching of an application works well.

steps.description: From the desktop, click on 'Application' in the gnome-shell status
Click on 'Terminal' to open the gnome-terminal application

name: launch-with-arrows
objective: Launch an application with the arrows of the keyboard
description: Launch an application using the arrow keys of the keyboard. gnome-terminal will be used to test whether launching of an application works well.

steps.description: From the desktop, type the windows key to access the 'Application' menu of gnome-shell

steps.expected: first application (top left must be highlighted)

steps.description: Navigate with the arrow keys to highlight 'Terminal'
Click enter to open the application
steps.expected: A window must appear in foreground

name: launch-with-name
objective: Launch an application with its name
description: Launch an application using its name in the input text field of gnome-terminal.

steps.description: From the desktop, click on 'Application' in the gnome-shell status
Click on 'Terminal' to open the gnome-terminal application

steps.expected: letters should appear in the terminal

steps.description: Type the enter key to validate
steps.expected: a second window must appear in foreground

name: switch
description: Open several applications and switch between them using Alt+Tab, the window of the focused application should comes in foreground when keys are released.

steps.description: From the desktop, click on 'Application' in the gnome-shell status bar
Open several applications for example : Terminal, Calculator, Contacts
steps.expected: the windows of the opened application should open

steps.description: Type and keep the alt key and then type repeatedly the tab key and release it

steps.expected: The window of the last application must appear in foreground

name: textfield-reset
description: after launching an application using the input text field, it, the input textfield, must be reset

steps.description: launch an term using its name in the input textfield

steps.expected: the textfield must have been cleared

author: jb
